attributes.comment:
My wife and I are extremely disappointed with the proposed rate increase
proposed in USCIS-2006-0044. Adoptions from foreign countries are expensive
and tedious enough without the Federal Government increasing the out of pocket
costs. It seems that this proposal would mainly, if not exclusively, punish those
who are trying to give others (legally) the opportunity to live in the greatest country
on this planet. We beg of you, do not raise the rates! It is already bad enough
that the USCIS forms and documents already obtained and fully paid for expire
after 12 months, when very few adoptions take less than 12 months to complete.
Again we ask, DO NOT RAISE THE RATES! Please stop the punishment of your
best citizens!

Thank You
Matt and Krista Conner

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Matt & Krista Conner
